hits.definition:
哥

[gē] (= 哥哥 gēge) older brother

惊 (F 驚)

[jīng] surprise

吗 (F 嗎)

[ma] <interrogative particle>

[má] what; 干吗? gàn má? What's up?

[mǎ] 吗啡 mǎfēi morphine

号 (F 號)

[hào] name, number, mark

[háo] yell

绝 (F 絕)

[jué] cut off, absolute

吧

[ba] at end of sentence, indicates suggestion

[bā] snap!

参 (F 參)

[cān] 参加 cānjiā participate

[shēn] 人参 rénshēn ginseng

[cēn] 参差 cēncī uneven, irregular

复

[fù] (F 復) 恢复 huīfù recover, (F 複) 复杂 fùzá complicated, complex, (F 覆) cover
